Title: Jack
Writer: Edward Berger (screenplay), Nele Mueller-Stöfen (screenplay), Nele Mueller-Stöfen
Actors: Ivo Pietzcker, Georg Arms, Luise Heyer, Nele Mueller-Stöfen
Plot: For JACK (10), having a family is the most important thing in the world. Then, one day, his mother disappears. Together with his younger brother MANUEL (6), he embarks on a journey to find her... the journey of a boy who has learnt from an early age to take responsibility. In the end, his brave and startling decision holds up a mirror to all of us.
